problem:
open Nat

def add : Nat → Nat → Nat
| zero, m => m
| succ n', m => succ (add n' m)

def mul : Nat → Nat → Nat
| zero, _ => zero
| succ n', m => add m (mul n' m)

theorem mul_comm (n m : Nat) : mul n m = mul m n := sorry

theorem mul_add_distr_r (n m p : Nat) : mul (add n m) p = add (mul n p) (mul m p) := sorry

theorem mul_add_distr_l (n m p : Nat) : mul n (add m p) = add (mul n m) (mul n p) := by
